alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 4:34PM EST until December 23 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting over 50 mph. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In Vermont, Bennington and Western Windham Counties. In eastern New York, Hamilton, Northern Warren and Northern Fulton Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibilities. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue through this evening and into the overnight hours. The snow is expected to gradually change to plain rain after midnight. Isolated pockets of freezing rain are possible tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
